trends: There have been no other sightings in Viinijärvi
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was inside my house playing on my computer it was about 2am-3am i was waiting the game to load i looked out the window and there it was a bright ball of light a bit smaller than the sun in the sky over the treeline i imidietly thought it was an UFO i saw it for about 1min it was moving pretty fast back and forth it was like i allready told a ball of light a bit smaller then the sun in the sky it like went up and down very litle and back and forth i got so scared i thought it would land in the forrest and come to my house my hands and legs shaked i kept saying to myslef "nothing to worry jst my imagination" but im 110% sure i didnt imagine it and after a minute it disapeared behind the tree line and i didnt see it again after that.
